statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); tokens=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context.tokens_loaded // 0'); exceeds=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context.exceeds_200k_tokens // false'); if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ]; then branch=$(cd "$cwd" && git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); git_info=" on ${branch:-unknown}"; else git_info=""; fi; if [ "$tokens" != "0" ] && [ "$tokens" != "null" ]; then tokens_k=$((tokens / 1000)); if [ "$exceeds" = "true" ]; then context_info=" | ${tokens_k}k tokens (!)"; else context_info=" | ${tokens_k}k tokens"; fi; else context_info=""; fi; printf "${dir}${git_info} | ${model}${context_info}"
